description: A refillable air cartridge for Mammut RAS and PAS airbags. It is not included with the RAS or PAS systems or their compatible backpacks, and is essential to operate them.This canister is full, so it cannot be shipped. Purchase an empty cartridge if you need it shipped through Canada post.Can be refilled at paintball or dive shops with a high-pressure compressor.0.36L aluminum and steel bottlePi, TC, DOT (US, Canada, Europe approved).Pressure gauge lets you confirm whether the cartridge is full.After a filled cartridge has been triggered, the seal caps and O-ring must be replaced.
name: Mammut RAS/PAS Refillable Cartridge Full
